Articles.Content:
Would it be possible for the developers to post a simple spreadsheet or list of all the new planets and moons with their basic official information on them?

Information such as:

Gravity, escape velocities, orbital distances from sun or planet and height of their atmospheres and atmospheric pressure at "sea level".

Also any thing else that would be needed for people to start calculating what they need for a trip to them.

-Thanks.

To my knowledge we don't have that info for Kerbin, the Mun, Minmus, or Kerbol supplied for the developers, so why should we expect them to supply all that other info?

You can rest assured that there will be players who will at least post rough information within the first 24 hours of 0.17's release on most of the new worlds.

KSP is still about discovering a lot of things on our own. But if you want it handed to you, you just need to be patient for others to share it on here.
